1.content: Here are the start of this tale of tragedy and love and happy and magic galore. You are a mans or a women?
1.title: Story Begin

11.content: Congradulate. You are a mans. What is your name?
11.title: You Are Teh Mans

choices: Go out and caught Seemor in the lot.
Ask the clerk to check the back for more gels.
112.content:
Your name is Cluod Strife, the great hero from FFVIII. You have small but strong build with purple and black oufit from the Shin ra SOLDIer program and a giant sword call Buster. But perhaps ur most recognizing features are your spiky blonde hair. It amazing and defies all law of gravitation (take that Newton and Einstein LOL). Well, except, not today because you forget to get more gels. WHATEVER will you do? Simple stupid--go to Wall mart and buy some gels. Oh yeah, you think to urself. So you leave on Fenbrir (your awesome motorcycel) and head to the store.

NOOOOOOOOOO!!!! you exclame because they have a total of ZERO GELS! What happen to them all you ask the store clerk. Simple, she reply, some blue hair man buy it all up. Oh no. You knew that mans. He were a BAD MANS. He were none other than Seemore, the wicked Guado. But you need that hairgel. Now. What will you do?
112.title: A Day In The Supermart

1121.content:
SEEMOUR WAIT UP! You shout. And just in time, because the mayster were about to get in his car (he drive a Prius). Oh hey Cloud whats up? Seymore, I know you just bought up all the gels!

What of it? ( remember when he say that when you find out he kill Jiscal LOL) Well, I need some! Myh hair is all a mess today and I got a date later, ya know?

NOPE!!!!! You were angry enough to punch him face in until you remember Seymour aint a bad man he just have a tragic depress dark backstory: him mother die :'( Please Seemore--just a little bit?

Hmm...

Does he give you some or not?
1121.title: Hey blue hair mans!

11211.content:
Sure cloud, but I need a favor. All right, what is it? Well...

GIVE ME THE BLACK MATERIA!!!!!!!1!

Oh is that all? Unfortunate, I give it already to Sephiroth. You have to ask him for it. He a nice guy, you shouldn't have any trouble.

Sound good to me. Here you go. Seemore give Cloud the gel and now him hair is the smex.

See ya later Cloud. Seemore walk away.

Now...
11211.title: Under one condition...

112112.content:
After months of searchingt the Guado come to the center of the planet where the lifestrream come from. There he find the one-winged angel he looking for. Seymour worried because he don't know how to approach Sephimorph. But its all okay because the mans approach him first.

Excuse me, Sephy start politely, Have you seen my mohter?
Umm... No. Seymour reply.
Oh...
What does she look like?
She beautiful. But she don't have a head. I stole it but then I lost it.
How sad. Can I have the black materia?
Sure thing, pal. Here you go.

Sephiman give Seymour the materia. But then, Tidus show up from the nethrworld and use him slice and dice on both the man. because he get him ultimet weapon, they go down real quick. Oh yeah! Tidus exclaim.

How sad....
112112.title: Seymour POV

1122.content:
Hey there ytou could check the back please cause it possible their might be some gels there you say to the clerk. Well I would but as it so just happen im extreme totes busy right now so i can not help you sorry. I understand...

Who does she think she is telling the wonderfaul mans Culod Strife how it gonna be? You decide to wait til she not looking (that take a little while actuality) then you sneek yourself into the back. There were no gels. There were no anything! The back was not a storage room at all.... IT WERE A PORTAL TO another DIMENSION!

Where does it take you?
1122.title: Check for me!

115.content: Your name has been and still remains Tidus. The pronunciation of this name is a mystery to all, buyt you think it Tie-dus (them crazy japanties think it teedus but i say no). Anywhows, you decided it time to retire from Blitzbaul. Good thing too because if not you die cause the watery sphere malfunction tonight. Will you retire?
115.title: Tidus

1152.content: Because you retire everyone in Zarnakland think you a loser and a wuss-face. It okay though--the joke were on them all because they all die when Sin attack. You don't because you moved away from Zenarkand the night beforehand and went to visited the place moved to the world of Final Fantasy VIII where the Ultimac live. They have jungle and beach and cactuar island. Right up your ally. Does you meet Squwall furst or is it Zekll?
1152.title: Your Life Change Forevs

info.brief_description: Ever wonder what it might be like to be stuck in an awful  Final Fantasy fan fiction?
info.description:
Ever wonder what it would be like to be trapped in a terrible Final Fantasy fan fiction? Here's your chance to find out!

Feel free to add as you see fit: in this story, worse is better!
info.pretty_title: Trapped In An Awful Fan Fiction
